abstract: Prosecutors open defense phase of trial of Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev by showing image of him making obscene gesture at prison surveillance camera three months after bombing; prosecution seeks to portray Tsarnaev as willful young man who acted on his own initiative, rather than pawn of his older brother, as defense has argued.
lead_paragraph: Gasps went up in the courtroom as the prosecutor showed the jury a photograph of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev in a holding cell thrusting his middle finger toward a surveillance camera.

headline.main: Penalty Phase Opens With Image of Boston Marathon Bomber Making Obscene Gesture
headline.print_headline: Penalty Phase Opens With Image of Marathon Bomber Making Obscene Gesture

snippet: Gasps went up in the courtroom as the prosecutor showed the jury a photograph of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev in a holding cell thrusting his middle finger toward a surveillance camera.
